name: nosh
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
UK old-fashioned slang food or a meal: They serve good nosh in the cafeteria. Synonyms
chow old-fashioned slang
eats informal
grub (FOOD) informal
[ U ] US informal a small amount of food eaten between meals or as a meal: I have a little nosh at about 10.30, so I don't overeat at lunch. Compare
snack noun (SMALL MEAL)
